=Data Inputs=

Cases:
1 - Required input, any value is ok (e.g. Get2DImagesByPOI srsName is resolved through call to Central)
2 - Required input, one of several allowed values (e.g. filter=maptype:coronal or filter=maptype:sagittal)
3 - Optional input, any value, with a default value (e.g. srsName defaults to Mouse_AGEA_1.0 if no value provided)
4 - Optional input, one of several allowed values, with a default value (e.g. filter=maptype:coronal, filter=maptype:sagittal, defaults to maptype:coronal if not specified)
5? - Optional input, any value, no default (I don't think this case makes any sense to me)

==Case 1==

ProcessDefinition (Deegree .../processes/Xxx.xml)
<code>
    <LiteralInput>
      <Identifier>srsName</Identifier>
      <Title>Atlas SRS Name</Title>
      <Abstract>The Atlas SRS (Spatial Reference System) name.</Abstract>
    </LiteralInput>
</code>

WPS DescribeProcess response
<Input minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1">
<ows:Identifier>srsName</ows:Identifier>
<ows:Title>Atlas SRS Name</ows:Title>
<ows:Abstract>The Atlas SRS (Spatial Reference System) name.</ows:Abstract>
<LiteralData>
